mapper.select: SELECT ml_specification.id AS bid, ml_specification.specName, ml_specification.productTypeId, ml_specification_option.id AS oid, ml_specification_option.optionName, ml_specification_option.specId FROM ml_specification LEFT JOIN ml_specification_option on ml_specification.id = ml_specification_option.specId where ml_specification.id = #{id}
